name: src/cli/cmd-config.es6
src/cli/cmd-run.es6
content:
import * as action from '../acts/run';

export default function () {
    return this
        .title('Run checker command')
        .helpful()
        .opt()
            .name('config')
            .title('Path to configuration file')
            .short('c').long('config')
            .req()
            .end()
        .opt()
            .name('url')
            .title('Url of website or page')
            .short('u').long('url')
            .end()
        .opt()
            .name('concurrent')
            .title('Number of concurrent requests performed simulteniously')
            .short('cc').long('concurrent')
            .end()
        .opt()
            .name('requestRetriesAmount')
            .title('Number of request retry attempts')
            .short('rra').long('requestRetriesAmount')
            .end()
        .opt()
            .name('requestTimeout')
            .title('Request timeout (in milliseconds)')
            .short('rt').long('requestTimeout')
            .end()
        .opt()
            .name('checkExternalUrls')
            .title('Set true to check external urls too')
            .short('ext').long('checkExternalUrls')
            .flag()
            .end()
        .opt()
            .name('mode')
            .title('Mode of analyze ("website", "section", "page")')
            .short('m').long('mode')
            .def('website')
            .end()
        .act((options) => {
            action.run(options);
        });
}

src/link-analyzer.es6
LinkAnalyzer
description: Hold logic about recursive links processing

name: constructor
description: Initialize predefined skip rules for prevent deeper crawling for given url

params.name: initial
params.description: url - base (root) url where analyze started from

name: url
description: Returns initial url as parsed url string via Url module

name: isNeedToSkipUrl
description: Returns true if anyone of skip conditions returns true

params.name: baseUrl
params.description: url of page where link is

name: isExternal
description: Checks if given url is external

return.description: true if url is external. false otherwise

name: _skipNonAcceptableProtocols
description: Check if protocol of given url satisfies acceptedSchemes criteria

name: _skipExternalUrls
description:
Checks if given url has the different hostname then initial
(If 'checkExternalUrls'rule is set to true)

name: _skipExcludedUrls
description: Checks if given url has host different then host of initial url

name: _skipOnMode
description: Checks if given url is need to be check depending on mode configuration option

name: src/model/broken.es6
BrokenUrls
description: Model for holding broken links information and methods for working with this data

name: add
description: Add url with given response status code to model of broken links

name: getByCode
description: Return broken url items with given status code

name: get404
description: Returns broken urls with response status equals to 404. Page not found error

name: get500
description: Returns broken urls with response status equals to 500. Server error

Document
description: Model for loaded document from link url request

name: _url
description: Url document has been loaded from
Parses response body parsed by cheerio

name: resolve
description: Resolves parsed link against document url

external

name: addToExternal
description: Add item to external links model

params.name: baseUrl
params.description: page url where href was discovered

name: addToActive
description: Add link url to list of active (checked at this moment)

name: addToPending
description: Adds item to array of pending items

name: getActiveLength
description: Returns length of active items array

name: getPendingLength
description: Returns length of pending items array

name: areExternal
description: Returns true if external items map contains items

name: areActive
description: Returns true if active items array contains items

name: isQueueFull
description: Returns true of length of active items greater then given max number

name: addToProcessed
description:
Returns true if items was not at provessed items
Also item is put into processed map

name: removeFromActive
description: Removes item corresponded to given url from active items array

name: removeFromPending
description: Removes first item from pending items array and returns it
